project_descr: UNDP support in the fight against HIV and AIDS in the Republic of Mauritius

outputs.output_descr:
The project has two components, contributing selectively to the national response to the HIV epidemic: The first one in the field of prevention being carried out since 2006 by the Council of Religions, while the second is with the Ministry of Health and Quality of Life and the National AIDS Secretariat. 
The budget of this second component is increased by USD 150,000, through an additional allocation of resources from HQ and extends not only towards the support of the development of the Mauritius Round 8 Proposal for the Global Fund but also contributes to the rapid scaling up of the national
